product.name: GRECERELLE 2025 Women's Spring Summer Boho Floral Print V-Neck Faux Wrap Maxi Dress for Wedding Guest, Graduation, Party
product.description:
Wear Grecerelle Maxi Dress to travel, leave behind wonderful travel memories!
For Graduation Season and Sweet 16
Summer dress for travel.
Weddings, proms, evening parties, work events, business  meetings, cocktail clubs, dates, casual outdoor gatherings, church  services, holidays, or other special occasions.
Measure bust, waist & back length. Refer to the size chart for the best fit. Bustier customers, go up one size.
What is this dress made out of?
It's made for the Rayon and Spandex blend. Super soft, Classy high quality fabric,very flowy soft.
Will the dress arrive wrinkle-free?
Please note that due to the rayon blend weaving material, this dress may arrive with wrinkles.
We recommend ironing the dress upon unpacking to ensure a neat appearance.
I normally wear a size Medium in dresses, what size should I order?
Our sizes are in US standard size. To ensure that you choose the correct fit, we recommend referring to the size recommendations we provide above.
And browsing customer reviews from individuals with similar height and weight.
Is this actually a wrap dress or a faux wrap dress?
This dress isn’t a true wrap, but has a tie to create the wrap look.
It gives a wrapping effect and avoids the inconvenience of overlapping hems, as well as the embarrassment of flashing when walking.
What are the washing/drying instructions for this dress?
You can machine wash it. We recommend using a neutral detergent. Do not bleach.
product.bullet_points:
• [Premium Materials] 95% Rayon + 5% Spandex, Super soft, Classy high quality fabric, very flowy soft. The fabric is light and breathable, but it is prone to wrinkling. It is recommended to iron it before wearing.
• [Focal Point] Casual Maxi Dress: Stylish, Fashionable, V - Neck, Ruffle Cap Sleeves, Boho Floral Print. Shapes well. This dress comes in many colors and will never go out of style.
• [Trendy Design] Floor length summer floral print Maxi dress, you will look vibrant and alive, stylish and elegant in it. Cross v neck, ruffle cap sleeves, short sleeves, elastic waistband. Slim fit will show off your shapely curves well. Irregular high low hemline, as if the lotus leaf is swaying, wearing it will want to start a romantic journey.
• [Relevant Occasion] You can pair a High heels and Stylish bag with it, a different beautiful look will occur. Perfect dress for casual, wedding, party, vacation, streetwear, cocktail, daily life.
• [Size Suggestion] This maxi dress may be long. To ensure the perfect fit, please measure bust, waist & back length. Refer to the size chart for the best fit. Bustier customers, go up one size.
